Run4YourBits

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Run4YourBits.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class defines the behavior of the main avatar and its different animations, it also includes the score,speed and the multiplier variables.
     

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String characterImage,
         java.lang.String characterHitImage,
         java.lang.String characterGameOverImage,
         int stepsPersonaje,
         int speed,
         java.lang.String jumpSound,
         java.lang.String dashSound,
         int respawnPoint)
        Constructs a character based on input
        Parameters:
        characterImage - filename of the avatar that will be displayed
        characterHitImage - filename of the avatar image when hit
        characterGameOverImage - filename of the avatar image when dead
        stepsPersonaje - number of frames the character image has
        speed - speed at which the character moves
        jumpSound - filename of the jumping sound for that level
        dashSound - filename of the ducking sound for that level
